name: CPTextButtonStyle
desc: The styles a button can apply to its title to communicate its action.

items.name: case normal
items.desc: A style that indicates the button performs an action other than to confirm or cancel.

items.name: case confirm
items.desc: A style that indicates the button confirms an action and changes data.

items.name: case cancel
items.desc: A style that indicates the button cancels an action and doesnâ€™t change data.
